Definition.WordDefinition: Mart, TX (city, FIPS 46824) Location: 31.54135 N, 96.83004 W Population (1990): 2004 (949 housing units) Area: 3.1 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 76664

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Mart \Mart\ (m[aum]rt), n. [Contr. fr. market.] [1913 Webster] 1. A market. [1913 Webster]
Where has commerce such a mart . . . as London? --Cowper. [1913 Webster]
2. A bargain. [Obs.] --Shak. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Mart \Mart\, v. t. To buy or sell in, or as in, a mart. [Obs.] [1913 Webster]
To sell and mart your officer for gold To undeservers. --Shak. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Mart \Mart\, v. t. To traffic. [Obs.] --Shak. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Mart \Mart\, n. [See {Mars}.] 1. The god Mars. [Obs.] [1913 Webster]
2. Battle; contest. [Obs.] --Fairfax. [1913 Webster]
mart n : an area in a town where a public mercantile establishment is set up [syn: {marketplace}]
